body:
# **Vision**

“Just creating a small contribution to the world of technology and businesses by innovation, imagination, and design.

We are collaborating with people's business by devising strategies through business analysis, market research and creating a better organic system for the society”

***

# **Changing Paradigm**

Business Change, Strategies Change, Technology evolves and new scientific methodologies revolutionize the world. We at SnipeInfoSystems, hold the strength of existing methodologies of Technology and Business processes and be the part of this change by revolutionizing the way things happen

***

#**Mission Statement**

“Technology and Business are our wings and we are just collaborating a small initiative for social cause, innovation and new business values to our people”

***

# **Social Initiatives**

### _**School Roof – 30 Lakh INR initiative**_
Rural education is lacking behind in Karnataka Education system. And we are backing these rural kids by fund-raising activity through our projects. Initially we are aiming at rural parts of Gulbarga. 
The project is headed by our Founder, Basavaprabhu at his young age took a great initiative and single handedly managed this great cause few years back. [Hindu Reports](http://www.thehindu.com/todays-paper/tp-national/tp-karnataka/article2405365.ece#.Tlo1-eWGn8E.email) "Milk production sees significant increase in Gulbarga district" without mentioning root cause of this movement". This time we are aiming at helping Rural kids in the name of our Social initiate “School Roof” under his guidance and our team full support. We are looking for funds for this initiative as well lots of volunteers who could join our good cause.

### _**“Take me home” - 30 Lakh INR Initiative**_
This is a project which is of building a portal and a mobile platform for our society which helps families track their lost loved ones from mobile and web portal which will be interlinked with the education department, GPS to track the last known location of missed individual or kids, and nearest police station. The lost child will be routed by the transport cost availed by the funds amount on-line. The initial funds help in making it successful. This is just a feature, and there are upcoming feature as well.

***

# **Technology Garage**

Straight to our Technology garage where we have our engineers lead by Shadakshari who is genius in building software products and a great visionary engineer. Supporting him is our 'Awesome' Designer and Business Lead Basavaprabhu. And I am binding this team, with a glue of running the business, following business practices and Technical Evangelism. My name is Rohit Kumar. 

In our Garage we create products which are beautifully crafted as per customers vision, and the products we build are aimed at design, user interface and future. We are building software products and with that we even provide our service to various customers across different sector of business.  We are by choice into software development provide best business solutions by chance. 

We are Building a Technology and Business lab in our team.

### _ASP.NET lab_ : 
I will be Shadakshari to take up his precious time to do start-up the ASP.NET Group meet up as well to get more insights and people around. In process.

### _Print Media_ : 
I am planning this initiative for Basavaprabhu to get involved in organizing a Print group as well in Bangalore. He even did initiate a Milk Federation in Gulbarga which is running great with farmers involved too. Most of our products we sell, part of the revenue will be shared in this good cause of helping the Milk Farmers, as Schools in Gulbarga.

Network Lab/Open Source Lab: Aiming at providing support to social initiatives with opensource code conference. Kids understand network program which is upcoming in “School Roof” program.

***

# **Team**

We are eight members in our team of SnipeInfoSystems and together we have advisor too. 

### _**Shadakshari**_
Shadakshari started his career as Software Engineer in Mindtree, and worked in Xyla Technologies. His service of 5 plus years in the technology across these various business processes is unmatched. He brings Microsoft Technologies expertise on the board and reaches the demands of Service with agility. His ability to constantly maintain the Software Development Cycle  and it's methodologies even matches with his personality. 

### _**Basavaprabhu**_
Basavaprabhu is a recent graduate but brings a loads of exposure in handling Small Scale Business Process. He sometimes run his father's business of Print Media, which gets him the edge of Design on Print and various software tools involved in it. He even is trained and worked on various designs of Websites with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jquery. He worked earlier with few other technology companies as Web Designer as well as Business Development Executive.


### _**Manjunath V**_
He is my school friend and I know him better personally as well as professionally. He is smart as well as hark working person. He comes up with expertise in C programming, Networking protocols. Actually expert in this. Device Driver development, Network Security. He is geek and very keen on detailed approach which helps us know lots of bugs not just in code but in our work as well. Personally he is humble and genuinely brilliant human. He works in a well established company as well as give a part of his free time acting as Core Open Source Contributor and Advisory. 

### _**Nagarajesh**_
Nagarajesh acts as Strategic External Consultant as of now. Who once in a while gives us useful inputs on our work free of charges on how we have to constitute our team and approach.  He too was my school friend along side Manjunath. He did his Engineering from NIE Mysore, and Strategic Consulting Studies from France. He works in a well established firm in Bangalore as well as give a part of his free time acting as Advisory team for SnipeInfoSystem at the moment.

### _**Elena Trifonova**_
Elena is from Russia who hands most of the Business operations, Deal breaking from projects from Russia. She works and simultaneously give a part of her professional expertise in Economics, Content Management, Online, Blogs, Social Media help from Russia. She is jovial person and great professional personal in our team with charming personality.

### _**Muheet Shariff**_
I know him since the last time I was working in Siemens. He is a ERP consultant as acting as a Business Consultant from Dubai handling few inquiries lands in. 

### _**Manjunath Singh**_
He is a hard working, great in operations. And core interested to know all the web technologies and how we can make use of it for a social cause. He is good in marketing and reaching the local people and building the network. He is best when you need things immediate on any help related with operations. Though he takes time and joins in our social initiative cause. He even taken an initiative JodiMarikamba Temple working hard to bring 9 lakh of donation to a heritage place in Maluru which is under verge of extinction by making the place coming under a trust name “JodiMarikamba Seva Samithi”.

### _**Rohit kumar**_
I started my career in Siemens as Consultant. I am trained SAP ABAP Consultant. Worked in ERP industry as well. I worked in Servelots in my previous company which lead me to greats such as T B Dinesh who gave me the vision of Open Source Technologies opportunities. I did work in few other companies in various roles to know how Technology works as well as Businesses happen. 


***


# **Services**

Since we are core product oriented company. We are running services to maintain our production work. We even build beautiful products for customers requirement of Web Development, Software Development, Mobile Application development.
Services we offer are as follows
1. Web Development
2. iPhone and Android Application Development
3. Business Analysis, Market research
4. Social Media Marketing, SEO, SCM, Blogs and many more services.

***

# **Careers**

Yes we are looking for geeks who bring right attitude and professionalism to our team. We are not confined to graduation though, But working knowledge on Skill on technologies such as ASP.Net, Web Development, Programming such as C, C++, C#, Python, Django, even HASKELL, Mobile App Development, and many more if you know let us know about it. Share your work, and we give you an opportunity to join our garage to create more beautiful things. We are currently looking for ASP.NET skilled persons. Send us your resume at _snipeinfosystemsltd@gmail.com_

***

# **Contact**

So far we are working from home and sometimes meet at Coffee joints. Though we work even in few incubation centres once in a while. You can reach us at _snipeinfosystemsltd@gmail.com_
